verses.verse: Nevertheless the dimness <WH4155> shall not be such as was in her vexation <WH4164>, when <WH6256> at the first <WH7223> he lightly afflicted <WH7043> <WH8689> the land <WH776> of Z'vulun <WH2074> and the land <WH776> of Naftali <WH5321>, and afterward <WH314> did more grievously afflict <WH3513> <WH8689> her by the way <WH1870> of the sea <WH3220>, beyond <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, in the Galil <WH1551> of the nations <WH1471>.

The people <WH5971> that walked <WH1980> <WH8802> in darkness <WH2822> have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> a great <WH1419> light <WH216>: they that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776> of the shadow of death <WH6757>, upon them hath the light <WH216> shined <WH5050> <WH8804>.

Thou hast multiplied <WH7235> <WH8689> the nation <WH1471>, and not increased <WH1431> <WH8689> the joy <WH8057>: they joy <WH8055> <WH8804> before <WH6440> thee according to the joy <WH8057> in harvest <WH7105>, and as men rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> when they divide <WH2505> <WH8763> the spoil <WH7998>.

For thou hast broken <WH2865> <WH8689> the yoke <WH5923> of his burden <WH5448>, and the staff <WH4294> of his shoulder <WH7926>, the rod <WH7626> of his oppressor <WH5065> <WH8802>, as in the day <WH3117> of Midian <WH4080>.

For every battle <WH5430> of the warrior <WH5431> <WH8802> is with confused noise <WH7494>, and garments <WH8071> rolled <WH1556> <WH8775> in blood <WH1818>; but this shall be with burning <WH8316> and fuel <WH3980> of fire <WH784>.

For unto us a child <WH3206> is born <WH3205> <WH8795>, unto us a son <WH1121> is given <WH5414> <WH8738>: and the government <WH4951> shall be upon his shoulder <WH7926>: and his name <WH8034> shall be called <WH7121> <WH8799> Wonderful <WH6382>, Counsellor <WH3289> <WH8802>, The mighty <WH1368> 'Elohim <WH410>, The everlasting <WH5703> Father <WH1>, The Prince <WH8269> of Peace <WH7965>.

Of the increase <WH4766> of his government <WH4951> and peace <WH7965> there shall be no end <WH7093>, upon the throne <WH3678> of David <WH1732>, and upon his kingdom <WH4467>, to order <WH3559> <WH8687> it, and to establish <WH5582> <WH8800> it with judgment <WH4941> and with justice <WH6666> from henceforth even for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>. The zeal <WH7068> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> will perform <WH6213> <WH8799> this.
The YY <WH136> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> a word <WH1697> into Ya`akov <WH3290>, and it hath lighted <WH5307> <WH8804> upon Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And all the people <WH5971> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804>, even Efrayim <WH669> and the inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802> of SHomron <WH8111>, that say <WH559> <WH8800> in the pride <WH1346> and stoutness <WH1433> of heart <WH3824>,

The bricks <WH3843> are fallen down <WH5307> <WH8804>, but we will build <WH1129> <WH8799> with hewn stones <WH1496>: the sycomores <WH8256> are cut down <WH1438> <WH8795>, but we will change <WH2498> <WH8686> them into cedars <WH730>.
Therefore the YY <WH3068> shall set up <WH7682> <WH8762> the adversaries <WH6862> of Rezin <WH7526> against him, and join <WH5526> his enemies <WH341> <WH8802> together <WH5526> <WH8770>;

The Syrians <WH758> before <WH6924>, and the Philistines <WH6430> behind <WH268>; and they shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> with open mouth <WH6310>. For all this his anger <WH639> is not turned away <WH7725> <WH8804>, but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still <WH5186> <WH8803>.
For the people <WH5971> turneth <WH7725> <WH8804> not unto him that smiteth <WH5221> <WH8688> them, neither do they seek <WH1875> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.
Therefore the YY <WH3068> will cut off <WH3772> <WH8686> from Yisra'EL <WH3478> head <WH7218> and tail <WH2180>, branch <WH3712> and rush <WH100>, in one <WH259> day <WH3117>.
The ancient <WH2205> and honourable <WH6440> <WH5375> <WH8803>, he <WH1931> is the head <WH7218>; and the prophet <WH5030> that teacheth <WH3384> <WH8688> lies <WH8267>, he is the tail <WH2180>.
For the leaders <WH833> <WH8764> of this people <WH5971> cause them to err <WH8582> <WH8688>; and they that are led <WH833> <WH8794> of them are destroyed <WH1104> <WH8794>.

Therefore the YY <WH136> shall have no joy <WH8055> <WH8799> in their young men <WH970>, neither shall have mercy <WH7355> <WH8762> on their fatherless <WH3490> and widows <WH490>: for every one is an hypocrite <WH2611> and an evildoer <WH7489> <WH8688>, and every mouth <WH6310> speaketh <WH1696> <WH8802> folly <WH5039>. For all this his anger <WH639> is not turned away <WH7725> <WH8804>, but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still <WH5186> <WH8803>.

For wickedness <WH7564> burneth <WH1197> <WH8804> as the fire <WH784>: it shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> the briers <WH8068> and tshofars <WH7898>, and shall kindle <WH3341> <WH8799> in the thickets <WH5442> of the forest <WH3293>, and they shall mount up <WH55> <WH8691> like the lifting up <WH1348> of smoke <WH6227>.

Through the wrath <WH5678> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> is the land <WH776> darkened <WH6272> <WH8738>, and the people <WH5971> shall be as the fuel <WH3980> of the fire <WH784>: no man <WH376> shall spare <WH2550> <WH8799> his brother <WH251>.

And he shall snatch <WH1504> <WH8799> on the right hand <WH3225>, and be hungry <WH7457>; and he shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> on the left hand <WH8040>, and they shall not be satisfied <WH7646> <WH8804>: they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> every man <WH376> the flesh <WH1320> of his own arm <WH2220>:

M'nasheh <WH4519>, Efrayim <WH669>; and Efrayim <WH669>, M'nasheh <WH4519>: and they together <WH3162> shall be against Y'hudah <WH3063>. For all this his anger <WH639> is not turned away <WH7725> <WH8804>, but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still <WH5186> <WH8803>.
